Breakfast

9AM – 1PM

  • ENGLISH BREAKFAST 7,000

    Toasted bread with bacon or chicken sausages, omelette,
    grilled tomatoes, and baked beans. Serve with a complimentary
    Tea.

  • NAIJA SPECIAL BREAKFAST 5,000

    Fried Plantain/Yam and Egg sauce, serve with a
    complimentary Tea.

  • NATIVE NAIJA BREAKFAST 4,000

    Akara with choice of custard or pap, liquid milk
    and sweetener served with a complimentary Tea.

  • THE GRID SPECIAL BREAKFAST 6,000

    Fluffy buttermilk pancakes paired with eggs omelette, grilled tomatoes, bacon or
    sausages.

Small Bites

  • PLATTER 30,000

    Prawn Tempura, Chicken Suya, Chicken strips, Yam fries, Plantain, Spring roll.

  • PRAWN SUYA 12,000

    Grilled queen prawns marinated in local spice, topped with fresh
    tomatoes and onion.

  • PRAWNS TEMPURA 12,000

    Fried crispy prawns served with mayo dip.

  • CALAMARI STRIPS 8,000

    Tender golden calamari served with homemade mayo dip.

  • PEPPER GIZZARD 6,000

    Diced gizzard sauteed in pepper tomato chilli sauce

  • TACOS 5,000

    chicken suya/beef suya layered with vegetable, drizzled with sweet and sour sauce, sprinkle of cheese.

  • CHICKEN/BEEF SUYA 5,000

    Marinated in suya spice, grilled to perfection

  • VEGETABLE SPRING-ROLL 5,000

Wings Party

  • BARBECUE SPECIAL 6,000

    Crispy wings tossed in savory barbecue sauce.

  • HONEY GLAZED CHICKEN WINGS 6,000

    Flavorful chicken wings tossed in honey and sweet chili sauce.

  • PEPPERED WINGS 6,000

    Flavorful chicken wings tossed in spicy sauce.

Rice

  • PINEAPPLE RICE 13,500

    Steamed basmati rice with shrimps, veggies and egg, stir with diced pineapples.

  • SINGAPORE NOODLES 12,500

    Rice stick dish combines with vibrant flavour of Basil leaf, vegetables and shredded chicken.

  • BUTTERED FRIED RICE 11,500

    Steamed Basmati Rice Stir in Butter, Chicken Breast & Veggies Garnished with Plantain.

  • NAIJA CHICKEN JOLLOF 11,500

    Naija smoky jollof with grilled chicken breast, garnished with veggies and diced plantain.

Pasta

  • SEAFOOD ALFREDO 16,500

    Creamy penne, Queen prawns, calamari, shrimps, and garnished with
    fresh basil and cheese.

  • CHICKEN ALFREDO 13,500

    Pan seared chicken breast, creamy penne, fresh basil and dried chilli ,
    sprinkled with cheese.

  • PENNE FAJITA 13,500

    Penne pasta stir in creamy chicken strip sauce, garnish with basil leaf and vegetables.

  • CHICKEN CHILLI PENNE 11,500

    Penne cooked in chilli tomato sauce with chicken strips, garnished with sprinkle of cheese

  • SPAGHETTI BOLOGNESSE 11,500

    Special Bolognese sauce sprinkled with parmesan cheese served with spaghetti.

Sandwich & Burger

  • PESTO CHICKEN SANDWICH 8,000

    Pan seared chicken cubes, layered with lettuce, Pesto mayo, mozzarella cheese served with french fries.

  • THE GRID CLUB SANDWICH 8,000

    Pulled Chicken Breast With Eggs, Mayo, fresh tomatoes, Iceberg Lettuce, & Creamy Cheese

  • CHICKEN BURGER 9,500

    Burger with shredded chicken, sautéed mushroom, and onions, iceberg lettuce,
    tomatoes with homemade sauce served with fries.

  • BEEF BURGER 9,500

    Burger with meat, sautéed mushroom, and onions, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes,
    with homemade sauce served with fries.

Grills

  • T. BONE STEAK 30,000

    South African beef steak, baste with herb butter, grill to perfection. Served with a side order of choice.

  • GRILLED STEAK 25,000

    Sizzling pan-seared imported South African beef steak with flavours from fresh herbs, served with a deglazed red wine reduced sauce. Served with a side order of choice.

  • GRILLED LAMBCHOP 20,000

    Marinated and grilled to preference, accompanied with a creamy pesto sauce. Served with a side order of choice.

  • SALMON FISH STEAK 17,000

    Pan grilled salmon fish fillet, marinated in herb butter, garnish with mix vegetables. Served with a side order of choice.

  • GRILLED PRAWNS 13,500

    Marinated grilled prawns served with rose sauce. Served with a side order of choice.

  • GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST 12,000

    Marinated grilled chicken breast accompanied with mushroom sauce, chilli sauce. Served with a side order of choice.

  • GRILLED CROAKER FISH 12,000

    Marinated grilled Croaker fish, baste with tomatoe chilli sauce, garnished with mix vegetable. Served with a free side

  • GRILLED TURKEY WINGS 10,000

    Served with French fries / Fried Plantain /
    Yam fries.

  • GRILLED CHICKEN LAP 9,500

    Served with French fries / Fried Plantain /
